tool_description: This is an unofficial Pinterest API.  Pinterest is a pinboard-style photo sharing website that allows users to create and manage theme-based image collections such as events, interests, hobbies, and more. Users can browse other pinboards for inspiration, 're-pin' images to their own pinboards, or 'like' photos. (Credits to http://pinterestapi.co,uk for the user-specific Pinterest APIs).
name: Pinterest
title: Pinterest

api_list.name: Show User Pins
Show User Boards
api_list.description: Show boards from Pinterest user.  Limited to 50 results
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ismaelc-pinterest.p.rapidapi.com/jwmoz/boards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ismaelc-pinterest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ismaelc-pinterest.p.rapidapi.com/{u}/boards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ismaelc-pinterest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
